snippet: As the polls in Iowa narrow and Mr. Sanders maintains a lead in New Hampshire, both candidates have shifted attention and resources to South Carolina, which has emerged as a crucial battleground should Mrs. Clinton lose the first two nominating contests.
abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders and Hillary Clinton both address black community leaders in South Carolina as primary approaches.
lead_paragraph: As the polls in Iowa narrow and Mr. Sanders maintains a lead in New Hampshire, both candidates have shifted attention and resources to South Carolina, which has emerged as a crucial battleground should Mrs. Clinton lose the first two nominating contests.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders Turn Focus to South Carolina, Courting Black Leaders
headline.print_headline: Clinton and Sanders Turn Focus to South Carolina, Courting Black Leaders
